hero.greeting: Hi, I'm DJ. I design & build web & mobile apps.
hero.introduction: I'm a former hospitality professional with a passion for programming & technology.  I create and develop web & mobile applications of all kinds, and utilize my unique hospitality perspective to analyze challenges from all possible perspectives.
hero.cliffNote1: - I worked in the hospitality sector for 10 years.
hero.cliffNote2: - Bilingual in spoken languages, multilingual in software lagnguages.
hero.cliffNote3: - I used to open & manage restuarants, now I build ideas.
hero.intro2: I ,specialize in eCommerce sites & customized apps for the food & beverage sector.
hero.intro3: If you would like to take a look at my work, feel free to demo the projects below!
hero.modalBio_edu: I graduated from Calfornia State University of Long Beach with a BA in Economics in June of 2010. In July of 2020, I received a certificate of completion from CodingDojo's immersive full-stack web developer program.
hero.modalBio_career: After college, I immediately jumped into what would become a 10 year career in the hospitality sector, primarily working in the two areas of hotel management and restuarant operations.  My previous work experience in this field shaped my critical thinking methods & practices, while also exposing me to an array of invaluable expierence based lessons; especially with respect to solving complex multi-variant challenges.
hero.modalBio_philos: All throughout my life I have alawys been captivated by the power of technology.  As a former hospitality professional turned software engineer, I now utilize the power of software development to design and build creative ideas and customized solutions. I specialize in web & mobile applications, and utilize my unique hospitality perspective to analyze challenges and opportunities from all possible perspectives.

projects.subheader: Take a look at my recent projects!

services.desc: React.js | Node.js | Express.js | Django | JRE-JDK-JVM | SpringWeb | ASP.NET Core | Bootstrap | Redux
